Service Pack: Service Pack of the Operating System

32 / 64 bit: System type

Date & Time: System date and time

Date & Time Format: The date and time in the format used by Warewolf

Disk Available: GB whole number of disk space remaining in CSV format per drive

Disk Total: GB whole number of total disk size in CSV format per drive

RAM Available: MB whole number of unassigned RAM at that point in time

RAM Total: MB whole number of physical RAM in the system

CPU Available: % of processor available per physical CPU in the system in CSV format

CPU Total: No of Cores * Speed in Mhz per physical CPU in the system in CSV format

Language: Computer default language

Region: Computer default region

User Roles: Windows Rolls assigned to user account that is running the Warewolf service in CSV format

User Name: Windows User Name of the account that is running the Warewolf service

Domain: Domain of the account that is running the Warewolf service

Warewolf Agents: The number of executing agents at that point in time" UniqueID="2f2c730f-5dde-4699-96f8-5b2a0fe1bab9"><uaba:DsfCommentActivity.AmbientDataList><InOutArgument x:TypeArguments="scg:List(x:String)" /></uaba:DsfCommentActivity.AmbientDataList><uaba:DsfCommentActivity.ParentInstanceID><InOutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String" /></uaba:DsfCommentActivity.ParentInstanceID><sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState><scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"><x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean></scg:Dictionary></sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState></uaba:DsfCommentActivity></FlowStep></Flowchart></Activity>
